name: Now That's What I Call Sing
name_original: Now That's What I Call Sing
description: NOW comes to PlayStation®4, Xbox One® with a complete new and chart breaking track list! Plug in your microphones, sing together with your friends or have a solo session to train your Karaoke skills. Discover the various exciting game modes that are quick and easy accessible via the new and user-friendly interface which gives you direct access to the playlist.
